name: OverflowBox
desc: A widget that imposes different constraints on its child than it gets from its parent, possibly allowing the child to overflow the parent.

fields.name: minWidth
fields.desc: The minimum width constraint to give the child. Set this to null (the default) to use the constraint from the parent instead.

fields.name: maxWidth
fields.desc: The maximum width constraint to give the child. Set this to null (the default) to use the constraint from the parent instead.

fields.name: minHeight
fields.desc: The minimum height constraint to give the child. Set this to null (the default) to use the constraint from the parent instead.

fields.name: maxHeight
fields.desc: The maximum height constraint to give the child. Set this to null (the default) to use the constraint from the parent instead.

fields.name: fit
fields.desc: The way to size the render object.
